title: The Post Season Is Upon Us (Podcast)
itunes:title: The Post Season Is Upon Us (Podcast)
description:
It’s that time of year, the MLB post season is here and who better to help us break it down than MLB Network lead analyst Harold Reynolds. Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch discuss the 2021 season that was and we get some insight into why Cal Ripken Jr might have been one of the smartest players to play the game. Don’t forget to check out Harold this Sunday, during MLB Networks exclusive broadcast of the Rays and Lynchies Sox. You can also catch him throughout the post season on MLB tonight. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
